long_description: The Osprey Axis daypack is equally comfortable in the city or on the trail. Attractive styling and well-considered features and comfort prove that this pack is Osprey through and through. Experience great ventilation and comfort from the die-cut foam shoulder straps and spacer mesh-covered back-panel padding. Removable 20mm webbing waist strap; sternum strap with whistle buckle. Panel-loading main compartment has a multifunction, bottom-padded sleeve; it holds up to a 15.4 in.laptop or a hydration reservoir (sold separately). Also includes a document sleeve, MP3 pocket and zippered mesh storage pocket. Large front stash pocket with key fob keeps everyday gear sorted and close at hand; includes inner mesh stash pocket. Front bungee compression system allows quick stashing. Single ice axe loop provides a place to lash on tools. Padded top grab handle adds a convenient way to carry the pack the Osprey Axis daypack.
short_description: The Osprey Axis daypack is equally comfortable in the city or on the trail. Attractive styling and well-considered features and comfort prove that this pack is Osprey through and through.
